text:
Fallis is a town in the U.S. state of Oklahoma.
Demographics.
As of the census of 2000, there were 28 people, 13 households, and 7 families living in the town. The population density was 81.2 people per square mile (31.8/km2). There were 17 houses at an average density of 49.3 per square mile (19.3/km2). The racial makeup of the town was 92.86% White and 7.14% African American.
